author: Ole Kristian Fjaerestad
description: Another CSS grid library. That's all.
name: @olefjaerestad/griddie

scripts.build: npm run clean:prod && tsc && NODE_ENV="production" node esbuild.config.js && npm run copy:static:prod
scripts.build:docs: npm run clean:docs && npm run create:docs && npm run build && npm run build-storybook && cp -a build/. docs
scripts.copy:static:prod: cp src/index.html build && cp -a src/partials build
scripts.dev: npm run rebuild:static:dev && NODE_ENV="development" concurrently "node scripts/dev.js" "tsc -w" "node esbuild.config.js"
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.rebuild:static:dev: npm run clean:dev && npm run create:dev && npm run copy:static:dev
scripts.rebuild:static:prod: npm run clean:prod && npm run create:prod && npm run copy:static:prod
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run rebuild:static:prod && NODE_ENV="production" node esbuild.config.js && jest e2e
